record.title: CHANGE OF VOTE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on rollcall vote No. 231, I voted "nay." It was my intention to vote "aye."
I ask unanimous consent that I be recorded as an "aye." This would not affect the outcome of the vote.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
